tasks.title: Welcome to Mission Control
tasks.description: This is your first task! Move it to 'In Progress' to see how the system works. Cal will automatically start working on any task you move to that column.
tasks.dod: You understand how to create, assign, and track tasks via the dashboard

comments.text: Task understood and Mission Control workflow fully operational

tasks.title: Test automated task creation
tasks.description: This task was created automatically by Cal via GitHub API to test the integration.

comments.text: Task created by Cal via Telegram
